name: Soccer Heroes Press Room Fight
description:
Do you ever feel the press room is boiling after a football match and the tension makes the room is going to blow up and the players are about to start a battle any minute? We do feel it, but the truth is that, if this combat ever happens, nobody sees it. For this reason, we bring you the chance to participate in this soccer fight in a press room, the situation and the action you always wait but never comes true!

The press room turns into a ring in this game where there is a fight with a football player in a battle you have never seen before! Will you be able to keep your soccer player unbeaten in this combat? The fight has started and this is not a team game anymore! Only one soccer player can win! Fight with your player in different game modes and against several rivals. Win rewards to upgrade your character and take him to the top among the rest of the footballJoin the press room soccer fight with your football player and win the combat!
fighters!

Come now to the press room, choose your faovirte player and let the battle start! ¡Enjoy defeating your enemy in this combat!

Features of this fight game in the press room:
- Defeat your enemy performing combos of kicks and feel the action of the soccer fight!
- Improve your football player and beat the rival in combat!
- Choose among several players from the best soccer league of the world!
- Win the tournament of the soccer combat in press room and ¡get to the top of the leaderboards!
- Compete against your friends and share your achievements as the ultimate football player in the pressroom battle!

Are you ready to see the football world from a very new perspective? Listen the crowd cheering you up in the combat! Play now!
